pkgmetadata.longdescription: Microsoft Azure CLI 'Database Migration Service' Command Module===============================================================This package is for the 'Database Migration Service' module.i.e. 'az dms'.. :changelog:Release History===============0.1.4+++++* Minor fixes.0.1.3+++++* Minor fixes.0.1.2+++++* Minor fixes.0.1.1++++++* Minor fixes.0.1.0++++++* BREAKING CHANGE: 'show' commands log error message and fail with exit code of 3 upon a missing resource.0.0.2+++++* Minor fixes.0.0.1+++++* Initial release. Adds support for the SQL to Azure SQL migration scenario.
